tasks.task: Loading a tarpaulin sheet onto a truck
subtasks: Tilt the tarpaulin sheet to fit into the truck bed
Lift the tarpaulin sheet onto the truck bed
Secure the tarpaulin sheet to the truck bed with ties or clips

tasks.task: Unloading a tarpaulin sheet from a truck
subtasks: Unfasten the ties or clips securing the tarpaulin sheet
Lift the tarpaulin sheet from the truck bed
Align the tarpaulin sheet with the unloading area

tasks.task: Securing a tarpaulin sheet onto a fence
subtasks: Roll out the tarpaulin sheet along the fence
Tie the tarpaulin sheet to the fence posts using rope or cable ties
Ensure the tarpaulin is taut and covers the intended area

tasks.task: Unrolling a tarpaulin sheet
subtasks: Grasp the tarpaulin sheet at one end
Maintain a grip while walking or moving the sheet
Unroll the sheet in the desired direction

tasks.task: Rolling up a tarpaulin sheet
subtasks: Secure the tarpaulin sheet to prevent it from unfolding
Fold the tarpaulin sheet neatly
Roll the folded sheet into a compact bundle

tasks.task: Driving a four-wheeler with a trailer
subtasks: Check the trailer connections before driving
Operate the four-wheeler to transport the trailer to the required location
Align the trailer with the desired parking spot

tasks.task: Setting up a trailer for transporting tarps
subtasks: Secure the tarpaulin to the trailer using ramps or hooks
Ensure the tarps are stable during transportation

tasks.task: Unloading a trailer
subtasks: Approach the trailer with the four-wheeler
Disengage the trailer from the four-wheeler
Transport the tarps from the trailer to the work area
Organize the tarps once unloaded

tasks.task: Tightening a coupling mechanism
subtasks: Identify the coupling mechanism that needs tightening
Apply appropriate force to tighten the coupling
Check the coupling for secure fastening

tasks.task: Securing a roll of tarp to a fence
subtasks: Position the roll of tarp near the fence
Use a cord or binder to secure the roll to the fencepost
Ensure the roll cannot unwind or slip

tasks.task: Attaching a tarpaulin sheet to a fence
subtasks: Staple the tarpaulin sheet to the fence posts
Overlap the edges of adjacent sheets for coverage
Secure the joints with additional staples or clips

tasks.task: Transporting tarps using a four-wheeler and trailer
subtasks: Board the four-wheeler
Attach the trailer to the four-wheeler
Load the trailer with tarps
Secure tarps on the trailer
Drive the four-wheeler and trailer to the work site

tasks.task: Deploying a tarpaulin over a structure
subtasks: Unroll the tarpaulin to cover the entire structure
Secure the tarp edges with ties or clips
Ensure the tarp is tight and properly covering the area

tasks.task: Storing tarps in a trailer
subtasks: Arrange tarps neatly in the trailer
Secure tarps with straps or ties to prevent movement
Cover the stored tarps with a larger tarpaulin if necessary

tasks.task: Removing a tarps from a fence
subtasks: Identify the tarp to be removed
Loosen the fastening mechanism (staples, clips)
Slide the tarp off the fence
Organize the removed tarp in designated area

tasks.task: Checking a four-wheeler's fuel level
subtasks: Locate the fuel gauge or fuel indicator
Determine if the fuel level is sufficient for the mission
Refuel if necessary

tasks.task: Attaching a duffel bag to a trailer
subtasks: Open the trailer door
Retrieve the duffel bag from inside the trailer
Attach the duffel bag to hooks or rings on the trailer
Secure the bag in place

tasks.task: Walking a four-wheeler with a trailer along a field edge
subtasks: Control the four-wheeler to follow the field edge
Monitor the trailer's position relative to the edge
Adjust course as needed to stay on the edge

tasks.task: Loading materials onto a trailer
subtasks: Position the materials near the trailer
Lift the materials onto the trailer
Organize the items on the trailer for stability

tasks.task: Driving a four-wheeler on a muddy farm track
subtasks: Maintain control of the four-wheeler on the muddy terrain
Adjust speed to avoid slipping
Navigate turns carefully to prevent tipping

tasks.task: Securing a tarpaulin around a pile of materials
subtasks: Cover the pile with the tarpaulin
Secure the edges of the tarp to the ground or nearby structures

tasks.task: Unloading a duffel bag from a trailer
subtasks: Open the trailer's access door
Secure the trailer to prevent movement
Retrieve the duffel bag from the trailer
Close the trailer access door

tasks.task: Inspecting a tarpaulin's condition
subtasks: Examine the tarp for tears, holes, or wear
Note any sections that need repair or replacement
Store the tarp in a safe place if condition is acceptable

tasks.task: Driving a four-wheeler along a designated route
subtasks: Follow the planned route marked on a map or GPS
Check for any obstacles or changes in the route
Adjust direction as needed based on observations

tasks.task: Tying a rope around the edge of a tarpaulin
subtasks: Hold the rope securely
Coil the rope tightly against the edge of the tarp
Secure the rope end with a knot or clip

tasks.task: Guiding a four-wheeler and trailer through a narrow aisle
subtasks: Slow down the four-wheeler's speed
Steer the four-wheeler carefully to fit through the aisle
Align the trailer with the narrow passage

tasks.task: Distributing tarps among multiple fences
subtasks: Identify the areas needing tarpaulin coverage
Transport tarps to each fence using the four-wheeler and trailer
Secure the tarps to each fence individually

tasks.task: Securing a motorbike with bindings or ropes
subtasks: Locate the motorbike to be secured
Loop bindings or ropes around the bike's frame
Tighten the bindings to secure the motorbike

tasks.task: Tying a tarpaulin sheet to a pickup truck
subtasks: Position the tarp sheet near the pickup truck
Wrap the tarp around a tie-down point on the truck
Secure the tarp with a rope or tie-down strap

tasks.task: Attaching a tire cover to a tractor tire
subtasks: Position the tire cover over the tractor tire
Secure the edges of the cover to the tire with straps or clips
Overlap sections to ensure coverage

tasks.task: Driving a four-wheeler with a trailer on gravel roads
subtasks: Maintain vehicle stability on uneven gravel surfaces
Adjust driving speed to match road conditions
Navigate corners at low speed to avoid rollovers

tasks.task: Securing a tarp over a load
subtasks: Cover the load with a tarpaulin
Secure the tarp edges with straps or ties
Ensure the tarp is tight and does not slip
